publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2413Charlie Gordon:British Airports Authority—That the Parliament welcomes the Competition Commission’s recommendation on the British Airports Authority (BAA)’s divestment of either Glasgow or Edinburgh airports as an appropriate remedy to BAA’s near monopoly of Scottish airports and one that will create a level playing field on which the airports serving the city regions of Aberdeen, Edinburgh and Glasgow can flourish. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2413 British Airports Authority (lodged on 20 August 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-2413 British Airports Authority (lodged on 20 August 2008) Tom McCabe*
S3M-2413 British Airports Authority (lodged on 20 August 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
